Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls are seeking their 4th straight home win.
The Wizards are 5-18 against Eastern Conference opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls are 14-13 in Eastern Conference games.
The Wizards allow the most points in the league, giving up 121.9 points while allowing opponents to shoot 47.3%.
Others: Nikola Vucevic is scoring 20.2 points per game with 10.1 rebounds and 3.3 assists for the Bulls.
Jordan Poole is averaging 21.8 points, five assists and 1.6 steals for the Wizards.
